trans-unit.source: Manages the definition of the <see langword="IEnumConnectionPoints" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 管理 <see langword="IEnumConnectionPoints" /> 介面的定義。

trans-unit.source: For new development, use <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IEnumConnectionPoints>.
trans-unit.target: 進行新開發，請使用<xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.IEnumConnectionPoints>。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a reference to the newly created enumerator.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含新建列舉值的參考。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new enumerator that contains the same enumeration state as the current one.
trans-unit.target: 建立新的列舉值，其包含與目前列舉值相同的列舉型別狀態。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: The number of <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IConnectionPoint" /> references to return in <c>cp</c>.
trans-unit.target: 要在 <c>cp</c> 中傳回之 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6.IConnectionPoint" /> 參考的數目。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a reference to the enumerated connections.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法傳回時，包含列舉連接的參考。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數會以未初始化的狀態傳遞。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains a reference to the actual number of connections enumerated in <c>cp</c>.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法傳回時，會包含 <c>cp</c> 中實際列舉連接數目的參考。

trans-unit.source: Retrieves a specified number of items in the enumeration sequence.
trans-unit.target: 擷取列舉型別序列中指定的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: Resets the enumeration sequence to the beginning.
trans-unit.target: 將列舉序列重設為開頭。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> 命名空間中的函式和物件都是供這些工具使用，以便從 Visual Basic 6.0 升級至 [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: In most cases, these functions and objects duplicate functionality that you can find in other namespaces in the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 在大多數情況下，這些函式和物件會複製在 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 的其他命名空間中可以找到的功能。

trans-unit.source: They are necessary only when the Visual Basic 6.0 code model differs significantly from the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] implementation.
trans-unit.target: 只有當 Visual Basic 6.0 程式碼模型與 [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] 實作有顯著差異時，才需要這些項目。

trans-unit.source: The number of elements to skip in the enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 列舉型別中要略過的項目數。

trans-unit.source: Skips a specified number of items in the enumeration sequence.
trans-unit.target: 略過列舉序列中指定的項目數目。

trans-unit.source: Functions and objects in the <xref:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Compatibility.VB6> namespace are provided for use by the tools for upgrading from Visual Basic 6.0 to [!INCLUDE[vbprvb](~/includes/vbprvb-md.md)].
